com.facebook.react.uimanager

类 SimpleViewManager<T extends android.view.View>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseJavaModule
      • com.facebook.react.uimanager.ViewManager<T,C>
        • com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager<T,LayoutShadowNode>
          • com.facebook.react.uimanager.SimpleViewManager<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - the view handled by this manager
    所有已实现的接口:
    NativeModule, BaseViewManagerInterface<T>
    直接已知子类:
    ReactCheckBoxManager, ReactImageManager, ReactPickerManager, ReactSliderManager, ReactSwitchManager

    public abstract class SimpleViewManager<T extends android.view.View>
extends BaseViewManager<T,LayoutShadowNode>
    Common base class for most of the ViewManagers. It provides support for most common properties through extending BaseViewManager. It also reduces boilerplate by specifying the type of shadow node to be ReactShadowNode and providing default, empty implementation for some of the methods of ViewManager interface.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • createShadowNodeInstance

        public LayoutShadowNode createShadowNodeInstance()
        从类复制的说明: ViewManager
        This method should return a subclass of ReactShadowNode which will be then used for measuring position and size of the view. In most of the cases this should just return an instance of ReactShadowNode
        覆盖:
        createShadowNodeInstance 在类中 ViewManager<T extends android.view.View,LayoutShadowNode>

      • getShadowNodeClass

        public java.lang.Class<LayoutShadowNode> getShadowNodeClass()
        从类复制的说明: ViewManager
        This method should return Class instance that represent type of shadow node that this manager will return from ViewManager.createShadowNodeInstance().

        This method will be used in the bridge initialization phase to collect properties exposed using ReactProp (or ReactPropGroup) annotation from the ReactShadowNode subclass specific for native view this manager provides.

        指定者:
        getShadowNodeClass 在类中 ViewManager<T extends android.view.View,LayoutShadowNode>
        返回:
        Class object that represents type of shadow node used by this view manager.

      • updateExtraData

        public void updateExtraData(T root,
                            java.lang.Object extraData)
        从类复制的说明: ViewManager
        Subclasses can implement this method to receive an optional extra data enqueued from the corresponding instance of ReactShadowNode in ReactShadowNode.onCollectExtraUpdates(com.facebook.react.uimanager.UIViewOperationQueue).

        Since css layout step and ui updates can be executed in separate thread apart of setting x/y/width/height this is the recommended and thread-safe way of passing extra data from css node to the native view counterpart.

        TODO T7247021: Replace updateExtraData with generic update props mechanism after D2086999

        指定者:
        updateExtraData 在类中 ViewManager<T extends android.view.View,LayoutShadowNode>
